name: Mac El Oliver's Dating Trainer
description:
Welcome to the authentic Dating Trainer

Mac El Oliver, the handsome womanizer will guide you through 6 different date scenarios.
He will give you authentic dating advice you can use in real life to enhance your dating skills.

"What should you wear to your first date?"
"How to approach proper conversation?"
"What to do in situations of discomfort?"

All those questions and more will be answered in Mac El Oliver's Dating Trainer.

You can select from different locations and be guided through real-life inspired situations.

Everything is narrated by Mac El Oliver himself.

You will unlock more locations by gaining dating points during your dates.

-central park

-french restaurant

-night club

-movie theater

-her apartment

After completening the dating trainer you can print out an authentic certificate to insure you that you are a true dating expert.
